title: JS-MONTREAL #20
blurb: Following our month off, here's an interesting presentation about QML, another place where your JS skills can be put to work. Since we only have one presentation this month, think of some libraries or tools you've discovered recently that you want to share with the group. See you all there!

speakers.title: QML - QT programs with JavaScript
speakers.name: Rahul Garg
speakers.synopsis: QML is a JavaScript-based, declarative language for designing user interfaceâ€“centric applications. It is part of Qt Quick, the UI creation kit developed by Nokia within the Qt framework. QML is mainly used for mobile applications where touch input, fluid animations (60 FPS) and user experience are crucial. Rahul will show us how to get started with QML.

speakers.title: Show and tell
speakers.name: Everyone
speakers.synopsis: Let's have an open show-and-tell about tools and libraries we've recently discovered or started using.
